snippet.title: Awareness Rooms | PLAYISM
snippet.description:
Escape from "Awareness Rooms"... coming soon on Playism! Jun 16th.
http://playism-games.com/game/281/awareness-rooms

When I came to, I was in a room I knew nothing of.

I gained awareness by checking objects, opening doors, operating machines...

Eventually I became able to perform various actions.

From searching blindly, to solving puzzles actively.

Relying on what I have made sense of to find my way out of here.

------------------------------------
PLAYISM Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/PLAYISM/
PLAYISM Twitter - https://twitter.com/Team_AGM_En
PLAYISM Store - http://playism-games.com/
------------------------------------
